scripts.build: npm run build:packages && turbo run build
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:types && npm run build:api-client && npm run build:ai-integration
scripts.netlify:build:complete: npm run netlify:validate && npm run netlify:install:robust && npm run netlify:build:packages && npm run netlify:build:web && npm run netlify:verify
scripts.netlify:validate: echo "ğŸ” Validating monorepo structure" && npm run netlify:check:structure
scripts.netlify:check:structure: test -d packages/types && test -d packages/api-client && test -d packages/ai-integration && test -d apps/web && echo "âœ… All workspace packages present"
scripts.netlify:install:robust: npm run netlify:clean && npm run netlify:install:root && npm run netlify:install:packages
scripts.netlify:clean: echo "ğŸ§¹ Deep cleaning for fresh build" && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json apps/web/node_modules apps/web/package-lock.json packages/*/node_modules packages/*/package-lock.json packages/*/dist
scripts.netlify:install:root: echo "ğŸ“¦ Installing root workspace dependencies" && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --include-workspace-root
scripts.netlify:install:packages: echo "ğŸ“¦ Installing workspace package dependencies" && npm run netlify:install:package:api-client && npm run netlify:install:package:ai-integration
scripts.netlify:install:package:api-client: cd packages/api-client && if [ -f package.json ] && grep -q '"dependencies"' package.json; then echo "Installing api-client deps" && npm install --legacy-peer-deps; fi
scripts.netlify:install:package:ai-integration: cd packages/ai-integration && if [ -f package.json ] && grep -q '"dependencies"' package.json; then echo "Installing ai-integration deps" && npm install --legacy-peer-deps; fi
scripts.netlify:build:packages: echo "ğŸ”¨ Building workspace packages in dependency order" && npm run netlify:build:types && npm run netlify:build:api-client && npm run netlify:build:ai-integration
scripts.netlify:build:types: echo "Building @faddl/types" && cd packages/types && npm run type-check
scripts.netlify:build:api-client: echo "Building @faddlmatch/api-client" && cd packages/api-client && npm run build
scripts.netlify:build:ai-integration: echo "Building @faddl-match/ai-integration" && cd packages/ai-integration && npm run build
scripts.netlify:build:web: echo "ğŸŒ Building web application" && cd apps/web && npm run netlify:install:web && npm run build
scripts.netlify:verify: npm run netlify:verify:packages && npm run netlify:verify:web
scripts.netlify:verify:packages: echo "ğŸ” Verifying package builds" && test -f packages/api-client/dist/index.js && echo "âœ… api-client built" && test -f packages/ai-integration/dist/index.js && echo "âœ… ai-integration built"
scripts.netlify:verify:web: echo "ğŸ” Verifying web build" && test -d apps/web/.next && echo "âœ… Web app built successfully"
scripts.netlify:build: npm run netlify:install && npm run netlify:build:web
scripts.netlify:install: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json apps/web/node_modules apps/web/package-lock.json && npm install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.netlify:build:web:legacy: npm run build:packages && cd apps/web && npm run build
scripts.db:generate: supabase gen types typescript --project-id dvydbgjoagrzgpqdhqoq > packages/types/src/database.ts
